item.title: Dr. Mohammad Saleh, MD. FACE
item.description: Dr. Mohammad Saleh completed his residency in internal medicine then fellowship in endocrinology, metabolism and geriatric at Wayne State University in Detroit, Michigan. Dr. Saleh is American Board certified in Endocrinology and Metabolism. Dr. Saleh is also a fellow of the American College of Endocrinology. Dr. Saleh is a consulting attending physician at Beaumont Dearborn Hospital and is the…
item.dc:creator: Vaibhav Sharma
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Mohammad Saleh completed his residency in internal medicine then fellowship in endocrinology, metabolism and geriatric at Wayne State University in Detroit, Michigan. Dr. Saleh is American Board certified in Endocrinology and Metabolism. Dr. Saleh is also a fellow of the American College of Endocrinology.

Dr. Saleh is a consulting attending physician at Beaumont Dearborn Hospital and is the author of several articles in medical journals in the field of Endocrinology and Diabetes Mellitus

item.title: Mariann, AGNP-BC
item.description: Mariann has a passion for the management of thyroid disorders and T2DM. She recognizes the unique individual needs of her patients and strives to give them the best possible care, working closely with them to achieve optimal health. She believes in health promotion and preventative care through education and by encouraging lifestyle improvements.
item.dc:creator: Vaibhav Sharma

item.title: Sara, FNP-C
item.description: My passion is to provide excellent and individualized care for all endocrine needs. Each plan of care should be personalized, to meet the specific needs of the patient, in order to maintain a balance for optimal heath.
item.dc:creator: Vaibhav Sharma
